nodes.bodyText: is this the same as waitAndInvokeMenuPath below?

Sorry for not answering sooner; missed the question.
It looks like it is the same. I don't write (or even read) this. Copy/paste/edit per instructions at the top. :) I would prefer to re-use IdeFrameFixture but it isn't intended to be re-used, so I have to re-write it.
